summary: CAR WAS PURCHASED 9/10/01.  FIRST PROBLEM OCCURRED IN APRIL 2002.  CAR HAS AN INTERMITTENT MISS.  DEALERSHIP COULD NOT FIND PROBLEM.  IN AUGUST 2002 CAR BEGAN SHUTTING DOWN WHILE DRIVING. THIS PROBLEM HAS CONTINUED AND HAS HAPPENED AT ALL DIFFERENT SPEEDS. CAR HAS BEEN INTO DEALERSHIP SERVICE CENTER A TOTAL OF 7 TIMES AND EACH TIME THEY COULD NOT REPLICATE THE PROBLEM. THIS IS A SAFETY PROBLEM SINCE WHEN THE CAR SHUTS DOWN THE POWER STEERING AND BRAKES ARE JUST ABOUT USELESS.  *NLM
